name: Cartoon Hands
description:
A collection of 3D cartoon hands, hand-crafted to use for your design and illustrations! The hands are made out of components so you can make your own and create variants.


Feel free to use the templates I created for the hand holding a phone and make it your own.


Please share with your friends and design lovers!

Will be updated in the future.


UPDATE: Cartoon Hands are also available in GIPHY.

Type fdgr in the search tool and use them as animated stickers in your favorite apps like Instagram!


Enjoy!

Follow my work on twitter: @filsdegraphiste
